class SpeciesAbundancesHandler¶

Base class for defining species abundances.

Subclassed by AnalyticalSpeciesAbundancesHandler, SimulatedSpeciesAbundancesHandler

Public Functions

SpeciesAbundancesHandler()¶

Default constructor.

virtual ~SpeciesAbundancesHandler()¶

Default destructor.

void setup(shared_ptr<NRrand> random, const unsigned long &community_size, const long double &speciation_rate)¶

Creates the SpeciesAbundancesHandler object.

Parameters
  • random: the random number generator
  • community_size: the number of individuals in the community
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate of the community

virtual unsigned long getRandomSpeciesID() = 0¶

Gets a randomly generated species identity.

Return
the species identity

void setAbundanceList(const shared_ptr<map<unsigned long, unsigned long>> &abundance_list_in)¶

Sets the abundance list.

Parameters
  • abundance_list_in: list of abundances for each species

Sets the abundance list.

Parameters

Gets a random species abundance.

Return

virtual unsigned long getSpeciesRichnessOfAbundance(const unsigned long &abundance)¶

Gets the species richness of a particular abundance class.

Return
the number of species with that abundance
Parameters
  • abundance: the abundance class of the species
